roleset.name: adapt for a specific purpose/person

example.name: passive
example.text: Most of the mailers are free, but Denver-based Financial Programs sells, for $15, [a version]-1 customized [*]-1 to the age of the child and the college of choice.
example.arg: to the age of the child and the college of choice.

roleset.note: CUSTOMIZE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'customize' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry. (from customize.01-v predicate notes)
